summary:
Just a simple mod to reduce the ridicolous high multiplier for
training at Expert (>50) and Master (>75) levels. The original
multipliers of 3 and 5 have been reduced to 2 and 3. There are
also linear versions available, i.e no multiplier.
descriptionHtml:
[u]Training costs[/u]

Just a simple mod to reduce the ridicolous high multiplier for
training at Expert (>50) and Master (>75) levels. The original
multipliers of 3 and 5 have been reduced to 2 and 3. There are
also linear versions available, i.e no multiplier.


Esp format:  training_costs_B_xE_xM.esp
where B = base multiplier for cost vs skill level (default = 10)
..... E = Expert level multiplier (default = 3)
..and M = Master level multiplier (default = 5)

Available version for base cost are:
10 = normal
20 = double
5 = half (cheatish)
1 = cheat - costs can be disregarded

If you usually steal the training money back (cheating, really), you
may as well go with the 1x1x1 version to reduce pickpocket skill gains.


[u]Installation[/u]

Select one esp, put it in Skyrim/Data, tick in the launcher, done.
author: moonballz
